Riven is really strong in higher elos where people have literally spent hundreds of games practicing animation cancelling trying to figure out what works and not. She has very few true counter picks and can normally come out on top in virtually any matchup. Except olaf, i lose everytime to that guy.

If it has to be one of those three, I'd say Ka...
http://cdn-frm-eu.wargaming.net/wot/eu//profile/5/71/21/photo-7217105-53e77161.gif?_r=1407676771
AHRI. AHRI IS THE FAIREST OF THEM ALL.
Omg  I actually laughed
Buy Riven and I will cut your head off. your choice

Katarina loses lane to basically everyone.  Ahri offers a lot for teamfights (charm can be a death sentence for the adc) and has a good laning phase.  Riven can dominate the top lane, but doesn't do much if she falls behind, so unless you are going to spend a lot of time mastering her I recomend {{champion:103}}
Ahri is the best choice of the three. Even better choice would be runes.

I dunno if it helps you but what I did is see what champs were on sale that week (every week they put different champs on sale) and bought those lower priced champs first and learned them... as I got better I could get better champs... I'm sure I got more champs out of just buying the sale priced champs first
just play garen for 300 games until you understand how to lane
Save up for the big ADCs, like Jinx or maybe Kalista.
none of the 3 if you are inexperienced at the role but if i HAD to chose ahri would be the best choice. Ori is better to learn with if you are playing mid.
